Description.Text: Theranda Hotel is a friendly 4-star property offering modern accommodation near the heart of the city. It boasts a bar, garden and free Wi-Fi. Blloku is an upscale neighbourhood which plays host to fantastic shopping and entertainment opportunities. Nearby places of interest include Tirana Big Park, QTU shopping centre and Tirana castle. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Tirana destinations. The hotel is housed in a distinct low-rise building with a striped facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 14sqm and decorated in a simple modern style with light wood furniture and parquet flooring. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the casual Theranda bar or in the garden. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a chargeable airport shuttle service.
